AI Description: Intel OneAPI is a unified programming model for accelerating artificial intelligence, high-performance computing, data analytics, and more across Intel CPUs, GPUs, and FPGAs.
Core Features: Unified Programming Model, Supports Intel Cpus, Gpus, & Fpgas, Versatile For Ai, Hpc, Data Analytics, & More
General Tags: Unified Programming Model, Heterogeneous Computing, Parallel Computing
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences, Engineering & Technology
